Recently you received a letter from us including a listing of pain management doctors in your area. It has been brought to our attention that a computer error may have caused the list to be inaccurate. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Attached you will find a revised list. When you are ready to discuss your treatment options, you can use the list to find a pain management doctor in your area. These doctors have advanced training in the diagnosis, treatment, and/or rehabilitation of people with chronic pain and are familiar with neurostimulation procedures.
If you have any questions about this letter or about neurostimulation, feel free to contact us by emailing contact@sjmneuro.com or by calling 1-866-990-PAIN (7246).
Warm regards,
The Power Over Your Pain Team
Enclosures: Pain Management Doctors in Your Area

w:r.w:t: Pain Management Doctors in Your Area

Below is a list of pain management doctors in your area who have been selected based on proximity to your address. You can also find doctors using the "Find a Pain Specialist" feature on our Power Over Your Pain website (PowerOverYourPain.com/locator). All the doctors on our site have experience with St. Jude Medical neurostimulation products, and none have paid or received a fee to be listed there.
